thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful place
thread.title_full: Wonderful place - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: Wonderful place
text:
If you are searching for a comfortable place to stay with refined ambience, Four Seasons Beijing it the perfect choice. Morden decoration and artistic details, the hotel offers remarkable service. It was a pleasant afternoon to speak with Fenghua and Delia and discover a lot the hotel creates. At the moment of leaving the hotel, I know I will come back soon.
Brown
